subject: Football
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Eleven U.S.C. players were drafted over the weekend, but the football program has probably not had such a bad week since O. J. Simpson took off in a white Bronco.
snippet: Eleven U.S.C. players were drafted over the weekend, but the football program has probably not had such a bad week since O. J. Simpson took off in a white Bronco.
